Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:24:36
Folder: C1QE62Z - qatar luxury & mach trading - par pl & mco - gig - expiring
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1QE62Z_00
From: Ahmad Abu-Shaaban <Ahmad.Abu-Shaaban@nascoqatar.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Jean-Pierre Aaraj <Jean-Pierre.Aaraj@nascoqatar.com>; Jeanine Elkhazen <Jeanine.Elkhazen@nascoqatar.com>; Eliane Tabet <Eliane.Tabet@nascoqatar.com>; Rahul Naik <Rahul.Naik@nascoqatar.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-22 14:02
Subject: Qatar Luxury & Mach Trading - PAR PL & MCO - GIG - Expiring on 30/09/2025 - Extension Request
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Hagop,

 

As discussed, we’ll be proceeding with extending the subject policies from 01/10/2025 to 30/11/2025, at pro-rata premium except for the Marine Cargo Open Cover policy. 

 

GIG has advised that they’ll be applying a 20% loading on the M&D premium applied at inception with respect to the Marine Open Cover policy is due to the adverse claims experience, details of which are attached for your ease of reference.

 

We’ll get back to you with binding confirmation shortly.

 

Regards

 

Ahmad Abu-Shaaban

General Insurance Manager

 



 

Nasco Qatar
